title: GWAS Pipeline
description: A comprehensive guide for conducting Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS), detailing the LNG GWAS pipeline for researchers.

title: UK Biobank SNCA Scripts
description: Scripts and pipelines for analyzing SNCA gene data within the UK Biobank dataset.

title: mitoAnalyzer
description: Software for analyzing mitochondrial DNA single nucleotide variants and copy number variations.

title: SAHA
description: A tool for semi-automated hand annotation for single-cell and spatial datasets.

title: Jupyter Tunnel
description: A script to set up an SSH tunnel and connect to a remote Jupyter server securely.

title: GenoML Website
description: The official website for GenoML, providing resources and documentation.

title: LNG utils
description: Utility functions and scripts for analysis in NIH HPC environments.

title: SAHA data
description: Companion dataset for the SAHA project, providing necessary data for analysis.

title: ADRD Brain Aging
description: Projects focusing on Alzheimer's Disease and Related Dementias (ADRD) and brain aging.

title: Xenium Line61 Spatial
description: Spatial transcriptomics data and analysis for the Xenium Line61 project.

title: AMP-PD whole-blood eQTL
description: AMP-PD whole-blood eQTL analyses, focusing on expression quantitative trait loci.

title: iMicroglia VLP
description: Investigating microglia responses to virus-like particles (VLP) in neurodegenerative contexts.

title: Bidirectional PD Smell
description: Study on the bidirectional relationship between Parkinson's Disease and olfactory function.

title: LNG posters
description: A collection of posters presented by the Laboratory of Neurogenetics team.

title: 23andme_rare_variants
description: Analysis of rare genetic variants using 23andMe data.

title: Detection of Frailty with Biomarker: A Population Health Study
description: Study on detecting frailty using biomarkers in a population health context.
